gripe.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to complain about something in an annoying way
gripe.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Joe came in griping about how cold it was.
gripe.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: something unimportant that you complain about
gripe.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: My main gripe was the price of refreshments.
